name: Dumbbell Upright Row
short: Pull dumbbells straight up along your body to collarbone level.
steps: Stand feet shoulder-width, hold dumbbells in front of thighs.
Pull dumbbells straight up, elbows leading, to collarbone level.
Pause and lower slowly with control.

name: Bent-Over Row (Dumbbell)
short: Hinge at hips, pull dumbbells to your lower ribs, squeeze shoulder blades.
steps: Hinge at hips until torso nearly parallel, keep back flat.
Pull dumbbells towards lower ribs, elbows close to body.
Lower slowly, keep core tight.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
short: Keep elbows by your sides, curl weights with control.
steps: Stand tall, dumbbells at sides. Elbows stay pinned to sides.
Move only forearms, curl weights up by contracting biceps.
Control both raising & lowering phases for maximum effectiveness.

name: Plank Shoulder Taps
short: High plank, tap opposite shoulder while keeping hips stable.
steps: Start in high plank, body straight from head to heels.
Lift right hand to tap left shoulder, place it back.
Alternate while minimizing hip rotation.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
short: Press dumbbells from chest to full extension, feet planted.
steps: Lie flat on bench, feet planted. Bring dumbbells down to mid-chest.
Keep elbows at ~45° angle (not flared too wide). Press up fully, squeezing chest.
Control both down & up motion for maximum effectiveness.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
short: Incline bench press to target upper chest and front delts.
steps: Set bench at 30-45°, lie back with dumbbells at chest.
Press up and slightly together, focus on upper chest.
Lower with control.

name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
short: Support one knee/hand on bench, row dumbbell to your hip.
steps: One knee & hand on bench, other foot on ground. Back flat & parallel to bench.
Pull dumbbell so elbow goes back past torso, squeeze shoulder blades.
Lower slowly with control, maintain flat back position.

name: Overhead Dumbbell Press
short: Press dumbbells overhead, keep core braced and avoid arching.
steps: Can do seated or standing. Keep core tight, avoid arching back.
Press straight overhead with full range of motion.
Don't rush; control downward motion is as important as pressing up.

name: Goblet Squat
short: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat deep keeping chest up.
steps: Hold dumbbell at chest, feet slightly wider than hip.
Squat down with good depth, knees tracking over toes.
Drive up through heels, maintain upright chest position.

name: Kettlebell Romanian Deadlift
short: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend, feel hamstring stretch.
steps: Hinge at hips, slight bend in knees. Keep back flat, core engaged.
Feel stretch along hamstrings as you lower weight.
Drive through heels to come up, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Cable Chest Fly
short: Bring cable handles together in front of chest, focus on squeeze.
steps: Set cables slightly above chest height, take handles and step forward.
Bring hands together in front of you, squeeze chest at peak contraction.
Return under control, feel stretch in chest muscles.

name: Farmer's Walk (Grip)
short: Carry heavy dumbbells with neutral grip, walk upright for distance/time.
steps: Pick heavy dumbbells off the floor with straight back.
Stand tall and walk controlled steps for specified distance/time.
Keep shoulders down and core braced.

name: Walking Lunges
short: Step forward into lunge, alternate legs while walking.
steps: Stand tall, step forward into lunge position.
Lower back knee toward ground, front thigh parallel.
Push off back foot, bring it forward to next lunge.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
short: Raise dumbbells out to sides until parallel with ground.
steps: Stand with dumbbells at sides, slight bend in elbows.
Raise weights out to sides until parallel with ground.
Lower with control, don't swing.

name: Cable Row
short: Pull cable handle to torso, squeeze shoulder blades.
steps: Sit at cable machine, grab handle with both hands.
Pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.
Return with control, keep chest up.

name: Tricep Cable Pushdown
short: Push cable bar down, extend arms fully.
steps: Stand at cable machine, grab bar with overhand grip.
Keep elbows at sides, push bar down until arms straight.
Return with control, don't let elbows flare.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
short: Rear foot elevated, lunge down on front leg.
steps: Rear foot on bench, front foot forward in lunge position.
Drop down until front thigh ~parallel to ground.
Push up through front heel, focus weight on front leg.

name: Arnold Press
steps: Start with dumbbells at chest, palms facing you.
Rotate and press up, palms face forward at top.
Reverse the motion on the way down.
